Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at H4 Hotel Hannover Messe in Laatzen, you'll be in the suburbs and minutes from Leine Center Laatzen, and close to Expo Park. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Hannover Convention Center and TUI Arena.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 222 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and coffee/tea makers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreational opportunities offered, including a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, shopping on site, and a fireplace in the lobby.

Dining
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, a business center, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM
Grab a bite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at H4 Hotel Hannover Messe in Laatzen, you'll be in the suburbs and minutes from Leine Center Laatzen, and close to Expo Park. This 4.5-star hotel is within close proximity of Hannover Convention Center and TUI Arena.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Leine Center Laatzen - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Expo Park - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Hannover Convention Center - 1.4 km / 0.9 mi
TUI Arena - 1.5 km / 1 mi
Hannover Fairground - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Luftfahrt Museum - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Tiergarten Hannover - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Commedia Futura Theater - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
Foro Artistico - 7.2 km / 4.5 mi
Swiss Life Hall - 7.6 km / 4.7 mi
Sprengel Museum - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi
Maschsee - 7.7 km / 4.8 mi
HDI Arena - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
Lower Saxony State Museum - 7.8 km / 4.8 mi
Eilenriede Stadium - 7.8 km / 4.9 mi

The preferred airport for H4 Hotel Hannover Messe is Hannover (HAJ) - 18.5 km / 11.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Copthorne Hotel Hannover is Hannover (HAJ-Hannover Airport) - 18.6 km / 11.5 mi.
